greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = number of 'Reverse and Add!' operations that have to be applied to the n-th term of A063064 in order to obtain a term in the trajectory of 10563.
link: Index entries for sequences related to Reverse and Add!
example: 12543 is a term of A063064. One 'Reverse and Add!' operation applied to 12543 leads to a term (47064) in the trajectory of 10563, so the corresponding term of the present sequence is 1.
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Jul 07 2001
